## v3.4.9
* Fix: declare express as a dependency instead of a devDependency to avoid failures after pruning dev dependencies.

## v3.4.7 && v3.4.8
* Fix: nullable should be allowed anyOf, allOf, oneOf.

## v3.4.6
* Fix: nullable should be allowed in nested arrays.

## v3.4.4
* Fix: circular references.

## v3.4.3
* Upgraded swagger parse to latest openapi ver 3.1.0

## v3.4.1
* Fix: Unknown coercion type undefined when type object is not defined, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4844

## v3.4.0
* Fix: openapi-ebay loses default values when object is extended, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4819
* Upgraded joi and enjoi to pick up fixes

## v3.3.0
* Added support for scoped module resolution, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2947

## v3.2.2
* Fixed: bodyRequest validator fails to handle oneOf|allOf, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2854

## v3.2.1
* Fixed: external schema resolution fails under node 12, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2433

## v3.2.0
* Added config attributes controllerMiddleware per https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2427
* Modified config attribute: preMiddleware -> preControllerMiddleware
* modified config attributes postMiddleware -> postControllerMiddleware

## v3.1.2
* Fixed: response validators not using ISO formatting for timestamps for string format

## v3.1.1
* Fixed: NPE when handling nullable properties with empty object, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2316

## v3.1.0
* Fixed: Nested $refs didn't work for nullables

## v3.0.0
* Preparation for opensource action
* Extracted oja context into openapi-context-ebay module

## v2.7.1
* Fixed: expressRouteValidator loses error message and details, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2240

## v2.7.0
* Added support for nullable properties
* Upgraded happy and joi

## v2.6.0
* Moved context to [oja/context](https://github.com/dimichgh/oja#context-api).

## v2.5.0
* Corrected result annotations, more readme and support of error mocking for actions.

## v2.4.0
* Added context support to decouple controllers/actions from express method signature and unify the way actions/controllers are declared and used.

## v2.3.0
* Use operationId as a name for the handler. This will allow to map different routes to the same handler

## v2.2.0
* Added spec to the route to be able to get any other arbitrary data from route spec

## v2.1.0
* Added option to provide custom resolver for external type references

## v2.0.0
* OpenAPI 3.0 support
